summary: This document contains a detailed financial report from Shoppers Travel, Inc., listing numerous transactions, invoices, and balances over a period of time. It includes names associated with various transactions, indicating financial relationships and activities relevant to the Epstein case. This document contains financial transactions from Shoppers Travel, Inc., detailing numerous invoices and balances over various dates. It includes references to several individuals associated with the transactions, particularly Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein, indicating their involvement in financial dealings. This document contains financial transaction records from Shoppers Travel, Inc., detailing numerous invoices and balances over various dates. The records include names associated with the transactions, indicating potential connections to individuals involved in the Epstein case.
